DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in the United States of America (USA). The purpose of this clinical research trial is to understand how safe and effective Recombinant Activated FVII is for reducing bleeding and blood transfusions in patients undergoing spinal fusion surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Use of Activated Recombinant FVII in Spinal Surgery
DOC.criteria: Elective spinal fusion surgery. History of thrombotic disorders (myocardial infarction, deep vein thrombosis, pulmonary embolism, stroke, disseminated intravascular coagulation or peripheral artery thrombosis) Any trauma within the last 3 months leading to hospitalization > 24 hours Angina or known coronary artery disease
